snippet.title: Best smart home devices
snippet.description: From smart locks to smart lights, we've reviewed all kinds of connected home products this year. Thi

snippet.title: TED for Android
snippet.description: The TED app is the best way to access TED's educational, inspirational, and entertaining videos from your mobile device.

snippet.title: New XPrize: Can an AI project get a standing ovation at TED?
snippet.description: The challenge: Come up with an artificial intelligence project that by itself can come up with a TED talk so good it gets a standing ovation.

snippet.title: Majoring in zombie with a minor in MOOC
snippet.description: AMC and Instructure recruit college professors to create a free, online course structured around the zombie drama.

snippet.title: Honeywell Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat with Voice Control
snippet.description: The voice control options are extremely basic, and the price increase just doesn't match the value added. Save some cash and get the $249 model or a Nest.

snippet.title: ZTE Merit (Straight Talk)
snippet.description: As an entry-level prepaid handset, the ZTE Merit is reliable, reasonably priced, and easy to use.

snippet.title: iHeartRadio brings talk online
snippet.description: Clear Channel's digital arm fires up an on-demand talk radio feature in beta that lets listeners shuffle user-generated shows made on Spreaker into their mix.

snippet.title: National Geographic Talk Abroad Lite
snippet.description: As a phone, the National Geographic Talk Abroad Lite is weak, flimsy, and lacks essentials. However, as an emergency travel phone, its light, simple, and affordable build could do the trick for some.

snippet.title: ZTE Majesty
snippet.description: The contract-free ZTE Majesty is a 3G handset sporting a 5-megapixel camera, Android Jelly Bean, and a low $170 price tag.

snippet.title: Tablet talk
snippet.description: Donald Bell sits down with Senior Editor Eric Franklin to discuss the best tablets announced at CES 2014.
